results.marketing_text: The Comfort Inn Staten Island hotel in Staten Island, NY near Newark Liberty International Airport will get you rested and ready for anything.
Our Carteret, NJ hotel offers guests free high-speed, wireless Internet access and a well-equipped 24-hour Fitness Center plus fine dining at Julian's Restaurant with a cozy and relaxing atmosphere.

results.marketing_text: Because the hotel's location has easy access to New York City, you can visit Big Apple highlights like the Statue of Liberty, Empire State Building and Times Square before returning to peaceful Staten Island for some rest and relaxation.
